DOC.brief_summary: It propose measure sperm DNA damage sperm chromatin dispersion test . This measurement help well diagnose male infertility seem easy apply routine . However , reliability method need evaluate apply clinical practice andrology laboratory .
DOC.brief_title: Reliability Detection Sperm DNA Damage Sperm Chromatin Dispersion Test ( Halosperm )
DOC.detailed_description: The aim study measure inter intra-observer reliability measurement sperm DNA damage sperm chromatin dispersion test ( halosperm ) . The gold standard measure sperm DNA damage TUNEL ( Terminal desoxynucleotidyl end label ) method . However , method easy apply routine . Therefore investigate analyse inter-method reliability sperm chromatin dispersion test TUNEL .
DOC.criteria: infertile men < 50 year least 5.106spermatozoa/ml ejacu azoospermia
